Press Forward.name: Press Forward
Press Forward.flavor: Knocking your enemies back, you step into the gap.
Press Forward.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Press Forward.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square. You can then shift 1 square into the space that the target occupied.
Press Forward.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a pick, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Forge Fire Heart.name: Forge Fire Heart
Forge Fire Heart.flavor: By looking to your own defense, you instill adjacent allies with courage.
Forge Fire Heart.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +4 power bonus to all defenses, and any ally adjacent to you gains a +2 power bonus to Will.

Keystone Collapse.name: Keystone Collapse
Keystone Collapse.flavor: Your strike hammers your foe and causes him to flail about, toppling nearby adversaries in the confusion.
Keystone Collapse.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push enemies adjacent to the target 1 square and knock them prone.
Keystone Collapse.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a pick, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Keystone Collapse.onMiss: Half damage, and you push enemies adjacent to the target 1 square.
